item.description:
DoggieDay Playcenter invites you to our monthly Pug Meetup on Saturday, March 4, 2006.

This will be the third monthly pug meetup and it continues to be a great opportunity to let all the puggies get to know each other and the puggie parents share their experiences.

As an added feature, we will have additional groomers and bathers available from 10-2 offering a reduced rate for all of our puggies to get their nails done, their ears cleaned and a bath. This is will be a self help bathing session, so we'll do the washing and cleaning and nail cutting, you do the drying and brushing. The rate will be $20.00 per dog, and it should be a fun time to have the group involved in the process! We'll need to know how many pugs will be participating, so if you could just shoot an e-mail to robgaleski@doggieday.com, we'll be able to plan accordingly!
item.name: The Boston Pug March Meetup
